## 1. Markov model with independent censoring and covariates

We start out with a simple Markov model.

\begin{align*}
\frac{\mathrm{d}\Lambda(t|x)}{\mathrm{d}t}=\lambda(t|x)=\frac{1}{1+x\cdot t}\cdot \begin{pmatrix}
-3 & 1& 1 & 1\\
2 & -5 & 1 & 2\\
1 & 1& -4 & 2\\
0 & 0& 0 & 0
\end{pmatrix}
\end{align*}

```{r setup}
library(AalenJohansen)
1+2+2
```
